Reviews.Title: works great witth CAT 5 cable for survilleance cameras
Reviews.Author: Jim
Reviews.Content: If you are using it for multiple cameras make sure to order a few extras.  A couple of them were defective.  Overall works great only problem was the couple of connectors that were defective out of 20.

ProductInfo.Features:
10 Cameras, CAT5 TO BNC Passive Video and Power Balun Transceiver
Great for short distance connection -Easier for CCTV camera installation, save time and save money
2.1 x 5.5mm CCTV Camera DC Power Plug Connector.
Cat5 to BNC Connector
Note: This connector does Not have video balun function.
ProductInfo.Name: 10 Pairs CAT5 TO BNC Passive Video and Power Balun Transceiver
